Description: Papyrus containing 13 lines of Greek text on the recto and a one-line address on the verso. The text contains a letter to a friend requesting articles of clothing to be sent.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (29008) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/29008)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Colgate Rochester Divinity School
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Oxy. XII 1583 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
